summary: A boy in abject poverty works in a hotel and becomes obsessed with a swimming pool in the opulent hills of Panjim, Goa, India. His life gets turned upside-down when he attempts to meet the mysterious family who lives at the house.
cast: Nana Patekar|Venkatesh Chavan|Jhangir Badshah|Ayesha Mohan|Krishna Appa|Ganga Chavan|Parvati Chavan|Somawa Chavan|Keshav Dalasi|Sheikh Abdul Gaffar|Pandari Gosavi|Mahesh Gowas|Prakash Gowas|Raghunath Gobind Kabadia|Vikram Keni|Vinod Mangela|Vijesh Naik
title: The Pool
